definition: to agree to pay compensation/to accept liability
to compensate for loss/to indemnify/to suffer a financial loss

sentences.english: Son and daughter-indemnities to sell the house.
sentences.chinese: 兒子和媳婦認賠賣掉房子。

definition: half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
lit. to drive a duck onto a perch (idiom)/fig. to push sb to do sth way beyond their ability
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
toss a peach, get back a plum (idiom); to return a favor/to exchange gifts/Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
to whisper to one another's ear
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
